Our Professional Nursing Programs

INC-approved courses designed to build your skills and launch your career in healthcare.

2-YEAR DIPLOMA PROGRAM

Auxiliary Nurses & Midwife (ANM)

The ANM program is the foundational course for a career in nursing, focusing on community and maternal health. Students are trained to provide essential medical care to rural and urban communities, manage health centers, and assist in childbirth.

Key Details

  • scheduleDuration: 2 Years
  • schoolEligibility: 10+2 Passed (any stream)
  • personAge Limit: 17 to 35 Years (Female Only)
  • health_and_safetyAdmission: Qualified in J.C.E.C.E.B Entrance Test

Career Prospects

ANM graduates are vital to the healthcare system and can work as Community Health Workers, Home Nurses, or at health and wellness centers.

Apply for ANM View Full Syllabus →
3-YEAR DIPLOMA PROGRAM

General Nurses & Midwife (GNM)

The GNM program offers comprehensive training in general nursing, midwifery, and patient care across various settings. This course prepares students to work as registered nurses in hospitals, clinics, and community health facilities, providing direct care to patients.

Key Details

  • scheduleDuration: 3 Years
  • schoolEligibility: 10+2 with English (min. 45% marks)
  • personAge Limit: 17 to 35 Years (Male & Female)
  • health_and_safetyAdmission: Qualified in J.C.E.C.E.B Entrance Test

Career Prospects

GNM holders can work as Staff Nurses, ICU Nurses, and Ward-in-Charge in hospitals, and are also eligible for further studies like Post-Basic B.Sc Nursing.

Apply for GNM View Full Syllabus →
4-YEAR DEGREE PROGRAM

B.Sc Nursing (Basic)

The B.Sc Nursing program is a professional degree that prepares graduates for leadership roles in clinical care, research, and education. The curriculum is built on a strong scientific foundation and covers advanced nursing practices, administration, and technology.

Key Details

  • scheduleDuration: 4 Years
  • schoolEligibility: 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry, Biology (min. 45% marks)
  • personAge Limit: 17 to 35 Years (Male & Female)
  • health_and_safetyAdmission: Qualified in J.C.E.C.E.B Entrance Test

Career Prospects

Graduates can pursue roles as Nurse Educators, Nurse Administrators, Clinical Specialists, or continue to M.Sc Nursing and Ph.D. programs.

Apply for B.Sc View Full Syllabus →
